data.text: @MassDPH Actually, unlike the disinformation in their tweet, you can do whatever the hell you want because it's a free country, and you don't have to check in with the government when you're sick. You'll see them in Nuremberg.
@Kat08998941 @MassDPH Lol. You took the vaccine??? Hahaha
@MassDPH Most people can recover at home w out hospital care? Since when was that the narrative????
@MassDPH Positive does not mean illness you will be ok at last
@MassDPH What happened to “the worst health crisis in history”!?!? We destroyed the lives of millions and ruined childrens lives for this!?!?

@MassDPH #StopGettingTested #StoptheFear #FreedomOverFear Use common sense if you feel sick stay home. The more positive test the more risk of Masks and Shutdown. We don't have the right leadership in MA for this. Unless you don't like freedom.
@MassDPH How long if vaccinated?? Do you need to quarantine?
@MassDPH Covid is over, we are moving on to World War 3. Too bad the whole Covid thing didnt get the controls in place for it though https://t.co/HVyGisrqgi
